verses.verse: The burden <S%H4853><s%> of the desert <S%H4057><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>. As whirlwinds <S%H5492><s%> in the south <S%H5045><s%> pass <S%H2498><s%> <S%H8800><s%> through; so it cometh <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> from the desert <S%H4057><s%>, from a terrible <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8737><s%> land <S%H776><s%>.

A grievous <S%H7186><s%> vision <S%H2380><s%> is declared <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8717><s%> unto me; the treacherous dealer <S%H898><s%> <S%H8802><s%> dealeth treacherously <S%H898><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and the spoiler <S%H7703><s%> <S%H8802><s%> spoileth <S%H7703><s%> <S%H8802><s%>. Go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, O Elam <S%H5867><s%>: besiege <S%H6696><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, O Media <S%H4074><s%>; all the sighing <S%H585><s%> thereof have I made to cease <S%H7673><s%> <S%H8689><s%>.

Therefore are my loins <S%H4975><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with pain <S%H2479><s%>: pangs <S%H6735><s%> have taken hold <S%H270><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon me, as the pangs <S%H6735><s%> of a woman that travaileth <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8802><s%>: I was bowed down <S%H5753><s%> <S%H8738><s%> at the hearing <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of it; I was dismayed <S%H926><s%> <S%H8738><s%> at the seeing <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of it.

My heart <S%H3824><s%> panted <S%H8582><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, fearfulness <S%H6427><s%> affrighted <S%H1204><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me: the night <S%H5399><s%> of my pleasure <S%H2837><s%> hath he turned <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into fear <S%H2731><s%> unto me.

Prepare <S%H6186><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%>, watch <S%H6822><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in the watchtower <S%H6844><s%>, eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8800><s%>: arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, ye princes <S%H8269><s%>, and anoint <S%H4886><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the shield <S%H4043><s%>.

For thus hath the YY <S%H136><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto me, Go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, set <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8685><s%> a watchman <S%H6822><s%> <S%H8764><s%>, let him declare <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> what he seeth <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And he saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a chariot <S%H7393><s%> with a couple <S%H6776><s%> of horsemen <S%H6571><s%>, a chariot <S%H7393><s%> of asses <S%H2543><s%>, and a chariot <S%H7393><s%> of camels <S%H1581><s%>; and he hearkened <S%H7181><s%> <S%H8689><s%> diligently <S%H7182><s%> with much <S%H7227><s%> heed <S%H7182><s%>:

And he cried <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, A lion <S%H738><s%>: My lord <S%H136><s%>, I stand <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> upon the watchtower <S%H4707><s%> in the daytime <S%H3119><s%>, and I am set <S%H5324><s%> <S%H8737><s%> in my ward <S%H4931><s%> whole nights <S%H3915><s%>:

And, behold, here cometh <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> a chariot <S%H7393><s%> of men <S%H376><s%>, with a couple <S%H6776><s%> of horsemen <S%H6571><s%>. And he answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Babylon <S%H894><s%> is fallen <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, is fallen <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; and all the graven images <S%H6456><s%> of her 'elohim <S%H430><s%> he hath broken <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto the ground <S%H776><s%>.

O my threshing <S%H4098><s%>, and the corn <S%H1121><s%> of my floor <S%H1637><s%>: that which I have heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>, the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, have I declared <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8689><s%> unto you.

The burden <S%H4853><s%> of Dumah <S%H1746><s%>. He calleth <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to me out of Seir <S%H8165><s%>, Watchman <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, what of the night <S%H3915><s%>? Watchman <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, what of the night <S%H3915><s%> ?

The watchman <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8802><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, The morning <S%H1242><s%> cometh <S%H857><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and also the night <S%H3915><s%>: if ye will enquire <S%H1158><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, enquire <S%H1158><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye: return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, come <S%H857><s%> <S%H8798><s%>.

The burden <S%H4853><s%> upon Arabia <S%H6152><s%>. In the forest <S%H3293><s%> in Arabia <S%H6152><s%> shall ye lodge <S%H3885><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, O ye travelling companies <S%H736><s%> of Dedanim <S%H1720><s%>.

The inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Tema <S%H8485><s%> brought <S%H857><s%> <S%H8689><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> to him <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> that was thirsty <S%H6771><s%>, they prevented <S%H6923><s%> <S%H8765><s%> with their bread <S%H3899><s%> him that fled <S%H5074><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

For they fled <S%H5074><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from <S%H6440><s%> the swords <S%H2719><s%>, from <S%H6440><s%> the drawn <S%H5203><s%> <S%H8803><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%>, and from <S%H6440><s%> the bent <S%H1869><s%> <S%H8803><s%> bow <S%H7198><s%>, and from <S%H6440><s%> the grievousness <S%H3514><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%>.

For thus hath the YY <S%H136><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto me, Within a year <S%H8141><s%>, according to the years <S%H8141><s%> of an hireling <S%H7916><s%>, and all the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Kedar <S%H6938><s%> shall fail <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8804><s%>:

And the residue <S%H7605><s%> of the number <S%H4557><s%> of archers <S%H7198><s%>, the mighty men <S%H1368><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Kedar <S%H6938><s%>, shall be diminished <S%H4591><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: for the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> it.
